articles.author: Ben Leonard
articles.title: Dr. Oz getting high marks from Senate moderates — maybe even Fetterman - POLITICO
articles.description: As CMS administrator, Oz would have latitude over health coverage for the more than 160 million Americans in Medicare, Medicaid and other health programs
articles.content: In naming Oz as his pick, Trump said Oz will work closely with Robert F. Kennedy Jr. to take on the illness industrial complex, and all the horrible chronic diseases left in its wake. Oz skeptics, ho… [+3675 chars]
